name: PriMaze
description:
PriMaze is a minimalist game developed within 48hrs of Jam at IPLeiria.
The theme for the jam was randomly selected from the highest voted themes "Three Buttons".
Game is about three geometrical figures a cube, a pyramid and a sphere with a strategy you change the order of the figures for which you most need to pass the level through puzzles.
Each figure has its special ability that will help you solve the puzzles and escape the maze.
